# Schema: `TagAssignment`

An assignment linking a tag to a securable object (schema, table, column, or macro), optionally scoped to a specific column.

- Type: `object`

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `assigned_at` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `assigned_by` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `column_name` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `id` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `securable_id` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `securable_type` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `tag_id` | `string` | `false` | - |
